content: **crochet evening bag / clutch in drops cotton viscose or safran and bomull-lin ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** height approx 12 cm width approx 24 cm **materials** drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 100 g colour no 01 white or use drops safran from garnstudio 100 g colour no17 white~ and use drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 100 g colour no 02 off-white drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g - or size needed to obtain 14 double_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 with 1 thread bomull-lin and 2 threads cotton viscose drops mother-of-pearl buttons no 541 10 pcs
